name: White Lavender
description: White Lavender is a sativa-dominant cross of White Widow and Lavender bred by G13 Labs. The influence of White Widow genetics adds a heavy coat of trichomes to the potent effects and flowery flavors of Lavender. The combination creates a hybrid that has calming effects led by the uplifting and creative nature associated with sativas. White Lavender produces a euphoric rush of cerebral activity alongside its intense flavor palate that combines hints of spices with fresh fruit.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Euphoric, Energetic, Talkative, Pain, Depression, Stress, Inflammation, Headaches, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Headache, Paranoid
